instructions: Sprinkle fish with salt & pepper.
Mix remaining ingredients in shallow baking dish.
Place fish in dish, turn to coat.
Marinate in fridge for up to 30 min, if time allows.
Preheat oven to 375.
Transfer dish to oven & bake for about 15 to 20 mins or until fish is no longer opaque and flakes easily with fork.
main_dish.title: Citrus Salmon

instructions: In a large bowl prepare salad mix according to package directions.
Toss with dressing of choice.
side_dishes.title: Green Salad

instructions: Heat oil in skillet, add onion and cook for 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds more.
Add cauliflower, water, & italian dressing.
Cover & cook 5 mins.
Add green pepper, salt & pepper & cook 5 mins more uncovered.
side_dishes.title: Cauliflower Italiano

instructions: Put bread into bowl.
Pour 1 tbs of oil & tomatoes over bread.
Let soak 10 minutes.
Cut chicken into cubes.
Heat remaining oil in large skillet on medium heat.
Add garlic & cook 1 minute.
Add chicken & cook until cooked through, about 5 to 8 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Pour bread mix into pan & cook 5 minutes on low until warmed.
Return chicken & gently stir into bread.
Sprinkle with cheese and serve.
main_dish.title: Chicken Panzanella

instructions: Preheat oven to 375.
Place asparagus in baking dish, drizzle with olive oil.
Sprinkle with salt & pepper.
Cook 8 to 10 minutes until just tender.
side_dishes.title: Roasted Asparagus

ingredients: 3/4 lb shrimp, raw, peeled and deveined
instructions: Thaw shrimp if frozen.
Mix soy sauce, lemon juice & parsley in small bowl, set aside.
Heat oil in large skillet.
Add garlic and cook for a minute until golden.
Add asparagus and cook for about 4 minutes.
Add shrimp and stir in soy and lemon mixture.
Cook for 3 to 4 minutes more until shrimp becomes opaque/pink.
main_dish.title: Shrimp & Asparagus Stir Fry

notes: Can Prep Shrimp & Veggies in Advance

instructions: Combine cabbage & carrots in bowl.
Toss with oil, vinegar, salt & pepper.
Note: this also works well with pre-shredded cabbage and carrots to save time.
side_dishes.title: Cabbage & Carrot Slaw

instructions: Prepare brown rice according to package directions.
If you want, add a little oil to rice while cooking (optional), or mix in some fresh herbs at the end (optional).
side_dishes.title: Quick Cooking Brown Rice

instructions: Cook pasta according to package & set aside.
Cut chicken into large pieces and season with salt, pepper, & garlic powder.
Heat oil in skillet on medium heat.
Add chicken, brown on both sides and cook until no longer pink inside.
Remove and set aside.
Add onion and cook for a few minutes.
Add dressing, tomatoes, & chicken to pan and heat for 5 to 8 minutes.
Place pasta in medium serving bowl & stir in chicken skillet mix.
Top with feta.
main_dish.title: Chicken Rotini

instructions: In serving bowl, whisk orange juice, oil, vinegar and salt & pepper to taste.
Add kale and orange slices and toss.
Sprinkle with goat cheese (optional).
Serve.
side_dishes.title: Baby Kale & Orange Salad

ingredients: 1/2 cup shredded mexican cheese, low fat
instructions: In a med bowl, stir tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice & salt and set aside.
In microwave or on the stove, warm refried beans.
Heat large skillet on med/high.
Warm a tortilla in skillet, place on serving platter then spread evenly with refried beans and a sprinkle of cheese.
Continue with all tortillas.
Cover to keep warm.
Heat oil at med/high heat in same skillet.
Crack eggs into skillet, a few at a time, depending on size of skillet.
Fry until whites are set and yolk is cooked as desired.
Place one egg on top of each prepared tortilla.
Repeat with remaining eggs.
To serve, top each tortilla with tomato mixture.
Optional: top with more cheese, more lime juice, and/or sour cream.
main_dish.title: Huevos Rancheros

instructions: Mash avocado in serving bowl.
Squeeze lime juice over it and a pinch of salt.
Stir.
Optional: can also add fresh garlic and/or chopped tomatoes.
side_dishes.title: Guacamole
